name: Mr. Blob (WIP)
description:
you want o do something nice for your sweetheart, and you've heard that the prettiest flowers grow in the swampland nearby. travel through the swampland, and collect as many flowers as you can!

flowers are points. avoid the murky swamp water, and acid rain, and dragonflies.

controls:

LEFT- left arrow key

RIGHT- right arrow key

JUMP- up arrow key

DOUBLE JUMP-tap jum again midair

GROUND POUND- down arrow key midair
